version_description:
Yay! Finally a new update released Pool 8 Offline!
Come enjoy our new contents! Pool 9! VIP system! New video-reward system!
And we also updated many things: fixed daily missions, added vibrate and click-to-aim feature (which you can set in the setting), re-make the tutorial system, fixed bug which may cause you miss lucky shot.
Download the latest upgrade now to get your hands on the new contents!
